attributes.action: Make it an offence to release foxes, urban or country, back into the wild.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I propose that it should be a punishable offence to release previously captured or rescued foxes back into the wild.
So many times I have seen town foxes struggle to survive in the country. They then get shot because they are not only more likely to attack and wreak havoc in the hours of daylight, but are also less canny than their country brothers.
Why cause such unnecessary suffering to not only our livestock and pets, but also to the foxes themselves. Once contained these pests can be humanely destroyed.
This insane misguided practice has continued for too long now. Please help stop it.
